description: Time-based considerations for data analysis and anomaly detection

maturity.explanation: Account creation to approval takes up to 4 weeks
maturity.measurement_rule: For mature approval rates, analyze accounts created 4-8 weeks ago

leading_indicators.description: Track fast-approval cohorts as early signals

cohorts.name: approved_under_1_week
cohorts.description: Accounts approved within 7 days of creation
cohorts.signal: Increase may indicate process improvement or quality change

cohorts.name: approved_under_2_weeks
cohorts.description: Accounts approved within 14 days of creation
cohorts.signal: Leading indicator before full maturity data

leading_indicators.implementation_note: May require custom query or separate Look

week_over_week.description: Compare same metric across consecutive weeks

baseline_comparison.use_case: Ensure not dropping below starting point

anomaly_detection_approach.description: Use standard deviations rather than hard thresholds
anomaly_detection_approach.reasoning: Different countries have different normal ranges (e.g., 5% vs 15%)
suggested_approach: Calculate rolling mean and std dev per country
Flag if current value > 2 std dev from mean
Consider both positive and negative anomalies

date_dimension_fields.notes: Use _week suffix for weekly trend analysis
